entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
